input.name: readStats
input.doc: Read count statistics collected with component RNASeqReadStats.

input.name: geneBodyCoverages
input.doc: Gene body coverage values collected with CalcGeneBodyCoverage.

output.name: batches
output.doc: Samples annotated with library metrics and categorial batch derived from the first two principal components (high, normal, or low)

parameter.name: caption
parameter.default: Sample clustering based on gene-indpendent metrics derived from global read count statistics, including the fraction of exonic reads among all mapped reads, the fraction of rRNA reads among all exonic reads, the fraction of duplicated reads among all uniquely mapped protein-coding reads, and 5' to 3' gene body coverage bias. Ideally, groups of interest (e.g. treatment vs. control or biological subtypes) mix and do not cluster. Significant clustering is indicative of major batch effects. In this case, cross-check the clustering observed here with the clustering observed from normalized gene expresion values.

parameter.name: sectionTitle
parameter.doc: Title of the LaTeX section or an empty string to omit the section

parameter.name: sectionType
parameter.doc: Type of LaTeX section: usually one of section, subsection or subsubsection. No section statement is written if sectionTitle is empty.
